article_title: Congressman Jason Smith Capitol Report: Liberty From IRS Slush

article_metadata.description: As the owner of a small business and our family farm, tax season has always been a stressful time for me. Unfortunately, the frustration over taxes doesn't stop with just paying them, but continues when learning how those taxpayer dollars are then spent.
article_metadata.author: Congressman Jason Smith
